sentence: Mike Brown; Kent County businesswoman Donna Brandenburg; Oakland County pastor Ralph Rebandt; Ottawa County real estate agent Ryan Kelley; Livingston County evangelist and substitute teacher Bob Scott; Lansing businessman Evan Space; and Grand Rapids entrepreneur and U.S. Army veteran Austin Chenge.
author: Paul Egan
title: 'Quality guru' Perry Johnson joins crowded Republican race for Michigan governor

sentence: Michael Brown of Stevensville, Byron Center businesswoman Donna Brandenburg, Farmington Hills Pastor Ralph Rebandt, and Grand Haven financial adviser Michael Markey would not be onstage with their competitors.
author: Paul Egan
title: GOP candidate for governor balks at Detroit Chamber debate over COVID-19 requirements

sentence: Those candidates are Byron Center businesswoman Donna Brandenburg and Grand Haven financial adviser Michael Markey.
author: Paul Egan
title: Former Detroit Police Chief James Craig files lawsuit over removal from August ballot

sentence: Another disqualified candidate, Donna Brandenburg, has also signaled intent to file a legal challenge.
author: Arpan Lobo
title: Michigan Court of Appeals: Perry Johnson doesn't qualify for August primary ballot

sentence: Last Thursday, the Board of State Canvassers split 2-2 along party lines on accepting Bureau of Elections staff recommendations to disqualify Craig, Johnson, Markey and Bryon Center businesswoman Donna Brandenburg.
author: Arpan Lobo
title: James Craig loses bid to appear on primary ballot after Michigan court denies appeal
